author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Curtiss-Wright Gets $85 Mln Contract To Support U.S. Navy Program
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Curtiss-Wright Corp:
* CURTISS-WRIGHT AWARDED $85 MILLION CONTRACT TO SUPPORT U.S. NAVYâ€™S FORD-CLASS AIRCRAFT CARRIER PROGRAM
* CURTISS-WRIGHT CORP - AWARD WAS RECEIVED FROM HUNTINGTON INGALLS, NEWPORT NEWS SHIPBUILDING TO SUPPORT PLANNED SHIP CONSTRUCTION
* CURTISS-WRIGHT CORP - ENGINEERING AND MANUFACTURING WILL COMMENCE IN 2018 AND WILL CONTINUE THROUGH AT LEAST 2022 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
